ygData.subject: RE: Cocktails for 20
ygData.msgSnippet: AAAAAAHHHHHHHH MYYYYY EYES!  i thought he said he liked the look of plate helms on wood elves.  i m sure i misread that. oh and its a Troll-Hide Belt,
ygData.messageBody:
AAAAAAHHHHHHHH MYYYYY EYES! i thought he said he liked the look of plate
helms on wood elves. i'm sure i misread that.

oh and its a Troll-Hide Belt, rogue/bard only, ac5 sta5 str5.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 15 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


>
> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>

> Bronze helm (sorry, the wood elf/bronze look was to good to
> pass up, no
> other reason for buying it *blushes*)
>
> Purity belt(dex,str, I have been THINKING of a thick leather
> apron just for
> the AC, but there is also an Elf-hide belt, no idea on stats,
> just that it
> is Bard only)

its a Troll-Hide Belt, rogue/bard only, ac5 sta5 str5.
